26 #ifndef TILEDARRAY_MATH_VECTOR_OP_H__INCLUDED

29 #include <TiledArray/config.h>
30 #include <TiledArray/external/madness.h>
31 #include <TiledArray/type_traits.h>

33 #define TILEDARRAY_LOOP_UNWIND ::TiledArray::math::LoopUnwind::value
34 
35 namespace TiledArray {
36 namespace math {

38 // Import param_type into
39 using ::TiledArray::detail::param_type;
40 
41 // Define compile time constant for loop unwinding.
42 typedef std::integral_constant<std::size_t,
43  TILEDARRAY_CACHELINE_SIZE / sizeof(double)>
44  LoopUnwind;
45 typedef std::integral_constant<std::size_t,
46  ~std::size_t(TILEDARRAY_LOOP_UNWIND - 1ul)>
47  index_mask;
48 
49 template <std::size_t>
50 struct VectorOpUnwind;
51 
53 
56 template <>
57 struct VectorOpUnwind<0ul> {
58  static constexpr std::size_t offset = TILEDARRAY_LOOP_UNWIND - 1ul;
59 
60  template <typename Op, typename Result, typename... Args>
61  static TILEDARRAY_FORCE_INLINE void for_each(
62  Op&& op, Result* MADNESS_RESTRICT const result,
63  const Args* MADNESS_RESTRICT const... args) {
64  op(result[offset], args[offset]...);
65  }
66 
67  template <typename Op, typename Result, typename... Args>
68  static TILEDARRAY_FORCE_INLINE void for_each_ptr(
69  Op&& op, Result* MADNESS_RESTRICT const result,
70  const Args* MADNESS_RESTRICT const... args) {
71  op(result + offset, args[offset]...);
72  }
73 
74  template <typename Op, typename Result, typename... Args>
75  static TILEDARRAY_FORCE_INLINE void reduce(
76  Op&& op, Result& MADNESS_RESTRICT result,
77  const Args* MADNESS_RESTRICT const... args) {
78  op(result, args[offset]...);
79  }
80 
81  template <typename Result, typename Arg>
82  static TILEDARRAY_FORCE_INLINE void scatter(
83  Result* MADNESS_RESTRICT const result,
84  const Arg* MADNESS_RESTRICT const arg,
85  const std::size_t /*result_stride*/) {
86  *result = arg[offset];
87  }
88 
89  template <typename Result, typename Arg>
90  static TILEDARRAY_FORCE_INLINE void gather(
91  Result* MADNESS_RESTRICT const result,
92  const Arg* MADNESS_RESTRICT const arg, std::size_t /*arg_stride*/) {
93  result[offset] = *arg;
94  }
95 
96 }; // struct VectorOpUnwind
97 
99 
102 template <std::size_t N>
103 struct VectorOpUnwind : public VectorOpUnwind<N - 1ul> {
104  typedef VectorOpUnwind<N - 1ul> VectorOpUnwindN1;
105 
106  static constexpr std::size_t offset = TILEDARRAY_LOOP_UNWIND - N - 1ul;
107 
108  template <typename Op, typename Result, typename... Args>
109  static TILEDARRAY_FORCE_INLINE void for_each(
110  Op&& op, Result* MADNESS_RESTRICT const result,
111  const Args* MADNESS_RESTRICT const... args) {
112  op(result[offset], args[offset]...);
113  VectorOpUnwindN1::for_each(op, result, args...);
114  }
115 
116  template <typename Op, typename Result, typename... Args>
117  static TILEDARRAY_FORCE_INLINE void for_each_ptr(
118  Op&& op, Result* MADNESS_RESTRICT const result,
119  const Args* MADNESS_RESTRICT const... args) {
120  op(result + offset, args[offset]...);
121  VectorOpUnwindN1::for_each_ptr(op, result, args...);
122  }
123 
124  template <typename Op, typename Result, typename... Args>
125  static TILEDARRAY_FORCE_INLINE void reduce(
126  Op&& op, Result& MADNESS_RESTRICT result,
127  const Args* MADNESS_RESTRICT const... args) {
128  op(result, args[offset]...);
129  VectorOpUnwindN1::reduce(op, result, args...);
130  }
131 
132  template <typename Result, typename Arg>
133  static TILEDARRAY_FORCE_INLINE void scatter(
134  Result* MADNESS_RESTRICT const result,
135  const Arg* MADNESS_RESTRICT const arg, const std::size_t result_stride) {
136  *result = arg[offset];
137  VectorOpUnwindN1::scatter(result + result_stride, arg, result_stride);
138  }
139 
140  template <typename Result, typename Arg>
141  static TILEDARRAY_FORCE_INLINE void gather(
142  Result* MADNESS_RESTRICT const result,
143  const Arg* MADNESS_RESTRICT const arg, std::size_t arg_stride) {
144  result[offset] = *arg;
145  VectorOpUnwindN1::gather(result, arg + arg_stride, arg_stride);
146  }
147 
148 }; // struct VectorOpUnwind
149 
150 typedef VectorOpUnwind<TILEDARRAY_LOOP_UNWIND - 1> VecOpUnwindN;
151 template <typename>
152 class Block;
153 
154 template <typename Op, typename Result, typename... Args>
155 TILEDARRAY_FORCE_INLINE void for_each_block(Op&& op, Result* const result,
156  const Args* const... args) {
157  VecOpUnwindN::for_each(op, result, args...);
158 }
159 
160 template <typename Op, typename Result, typename... Args>
161 TILEDARRAY_FORCE_INLINE void for_each_block(Op&& op, Block<Result>& result,
162  Block<Args>&&... args) {
163  VecOpUnwindN::for_each(op, result.data(), args.data()...);
164 }
165 
166 template <typename Op, typename Result, typename... Args>
167 TILEDARRAY_FORCE_INLINE void for_each_block_n(
168  Op&& op, const std::size_t n, Result* MADNESS_RESTRICT const result,
169  const Args* MADNESS_RESTRICT const... args) {
170  for (std::size_t i = 0ul; i < n; ++i) op(result[i], args[i]...);
171 }
172 
173 template <typename Op, typename Result, typename... Args>
174 TILEDARRAY_FORCE_INLINE typename std::enable_if<(sizeof...(Args) >= 0)>::type
175 for_each_block_ptr(Op&& op, Result* const result, const Args* const... args) {
176  VecOpUnwindN::for_each_ptr(op, result, args...);
177 }
178 
179 template <typename Op, typename Result, typename... Args>
180 TILEDARRAY_FORCE_INLINE typename std::enable_if<(sizeof...(Args) > 0)>::type
181 for_each_block_ptr(Op&& op, Result* const result, Block<Args>&&... args) {
182  VecOpUnwindN::for_each_ptr(op, result, args.data()...);
183 }
184 
185 template <typename Op, typename Result, typename... Args>
186 TILEDARRAY_FORCE_INLINE void for_each_block_ptr_n(
187  Op&& op, const std::size_t n, Result* MADNESS_RESTRICT const result,
188  const Args* MADNESS_RESTRICT const... args) {
189  for (std::size_t i = 0ul; i < n; ++i) op(result + i, args[i]...);
190 }
191 
192 template <typename Op, typename Result, typename... Args>
193 TILEDARRAY_FORCE_INLINE void reduce_block(Op&& op, Result& result,
194  const Args* const... args) {
195  VecOpUnwindN::reduce(op, result, args...);
196 }
197 
198 template <typename Op, typename Result, typename... Args>
199 TILEDARRAY_FORCE_INLINE void reduce_block(Op&& op, Result& result,
200  Block<Args>&&... args) {
201  VecOpUnwindN::reduce(op, result, args.data()...);
202 }
203 
204 template <typename Op, typename Result, typename... Args>
205 TILEDARRAY_FORCE_INLINE void reduce_block_n(
206  Op&& op, const std::size_t n, Result& MADNESS_RESTRICT result,
207  const Args* MADNESS_RESTRICT const... args) {
208  for (std::size_t i = 0ul; i < n; ++i) op(result, args[i]...);
209 }
210 
211 template <typename Result, typename Arg>
212 TILEDARRAY_FORCE_INLINE void copy_block(Result* const result,
213  const Arg* const arg) {
214  for_each_block([](Result& lhs, param_type<Arg> rhs) { lhs = rhs; }, result,
215  arg);
216 }
217 
218 template <typename Arg, typename Result>
219 TILEDARRAY_FORCE_INLINE void copy_block_n(std::size_t n, Result* const result,
220  const Arg* const arg) {
221  for_each_block_n([](Result& lhs, param_type<Arg> rhs) { lhs = rhs; }, n,
222  result, arg);
223 }
224 
225 template <typename Arg, typename Result>
226 TILEDARRAY_FORCE_INLINE void scatter_block(Result* const result,
227  const std::size_t stride,
228  const Arg* const arg) {
229  VecOpUnwindN::scatter(result, arg, stride);
230 }
231 
232 template <typename Result, typename Arg>
233 TILEDARRAY_FORCE_INLINE void scatter_block_n(const std::size_t n,
234  Result* result,
235  const std::size_t stride,
236  const Arg* const arg) {
237  for (std::size_t i = 0; i < n; ++i, result += stride) *result = arg[i];
238 }
239 
240 template <typename Result, typename Arg>
241 TILEDARRAY_FORCE_INLINE void gather_block(Result* const result,
242  const Arg* const arg,
243  const std::size_t stride) {
244  VecOpUnwindN::gather(result, arg, stride);
245 }
246 
247 template <typename Arg, typename Result>
248 TILEDARRAY_FORCE_INLINE void gather_block_n(const std::size_t n,
249  Result* const result,
250  const Arg* const arg,
251  const std::size_t stride) {
252  for (std::size_t i = 0; i < n; ++i, arg += stride) result[i] = *arg;
253 }
254 
255 template <typename T>
256 class Block {
257  TILEDARRAY_ALIGNED_STORAGE T block_[TILEDARRAY_LOOP_UNWIND];
258 
259  public:
260  Block() {}
261  explicit Block(const T* const data) { load(data); }
262 
263  void load(const T* const data) { copy_block(block_, data); }
264 
265  void store(T* const data) const { copy_block(data, block_); }
266 
267  Block<T>& gather(const T* const data, const std::size_t stride) {
268  gather_block(block_, data, stride);
269  return *this;
270  }
271 
272  void scatter_to(T* const data, std::size_t stride) const {
273  scatter_block(data, stride, block_);
274  }
275 
276  T* data() { return block_; }
277  const T* data() const { return block_; }
278 
279 }; // class Block
280 
281 #ifdef HAVE_INTEL_TBB
282 
283 struct SizeTRange {
284  static constexpr std::size_t block_size = TILEDARRAY_LOOP_UNWIND;
285 
286  // GRAIN_SIZE is set to 8 to trigger TiledArray Unit Test
287  // in reality, partition is controled by tbb::auto_partitioner instead of
288  // GRAIN_SIZE
289  static constexpr std::size_t GRAIN_SIZE = 8ul;
290 
291  size_t lower;
292  size_t upper;
293 
294  SizeTRange(const size_t start, const size_t end) : lower(start), upper(end) {}
295 
296  // SizeTRange(const size_t n, const size_t g_size)
297  // : lower(0), upper(n - 1), grain_size(g_size) { }
298 
299  SizeTRange() = default;
300  SizeTRange(const SizeTRange& r) = default;
301 
302  ~SizeTRange() {}
303 
304  // void set_grain_size(std::size_t grain_size){
305  // GRAIN_SIZE = grain_size;
306  // }
307 
308  bool empty() const { return lower > upper; }
309 
310  bool is_divisible() const { return size() >= 2 * GRAIN_SIZE; }
311 
312  size_t begin() const { return lower; }
313 
314  size_t end() const { return upper; }
315 
316  size_t size() const { return upper - lower; }
317 
318  SizeTRange(SizeTRange& r, tbb::split) {
319  size_t nblock = (r.upper - r.lower) / block_size;
320  nblock = (nblock + 1) / 2;
321  lower = r.lower + nblock * block_size;
322  upper = r.upper;
323  r.upper = lower;
324  }
325 };
326 
327 // SizeTRange::set_grain_size(1024ul);
328 
329 #endif
330 
331 template <typename Op, typename Result, typename... Args,
332  typename std::enable_if<std::is_void<typename std::result_of<
333  Op(Result&, Args...)>::type>::value>::type* = nullptr>
334 void inplace_vector_op_serial(Op&& op, const std::size_t n,
335  Result* const result, const Args* const... args) {
336  std::size_t i = 0ul;
337 
338  // Compute block iteration limit
339  constexpr std::size_t index_mask = ~std::size_t(TILEDARRAY_LOOP_UNWIND - 1ul);
340  const std::size_t nx = n & index_mask;
341 
342  for (; i < nx; i += TILEDARRAY_LOOP_UNWIND) {
343  Block<Result> result_block(result + i);
344  for_each_block(op, result_block, Block<Args>(args + i)...);
345  result_block.store(result + i);
346  }
347 
348  for_each_block_n(op, n - i, result + i, (args + i)...);
349 }
350 
351 #ifdef HAVE_INTEL_TBB
352 
353 template <typename Op, typename Result, typename... Args>
354 class ApplyInplaceVectorOp {
355  public:
356  ApplyInplaceVectorOp(Op& op, Result* const result, const Args* const... args)
357  : op_(op), result_(result), args_(args...) {}
358 
359  ~ApplyInplaceVectorOp() {}
360 
361  template <std::size_t... Is>
362  void helper(SizeTRange& range, const std::index_sequence<Is...>&) const {
363  std::size_t offset = range.begin();
364  std::size_t n_range = range.size();
365  inplace_vector_op_serial(op_, n_range, result_ + offset,
366  (std::get<Is>(args_) + offset)...);
367  }
368 
369  void operator()(SizeTRange& range) const {
370  helper(range, std::make_index_sequence<sizeof...(Args)>());
371  }
372 
373  private:
374  Op& op_;
375  Result* const result_;
376  std::tuple<const Args* const...> args_;
377 };
378 
379 #endif
380 
381 template <typename Op, typename Result, typename... Args,
382  typename std::enable_if<std::is_void<typename std::result_of<
383  Op(Result&, Args...)>::type>::value>::type* = nullptr>
384 void inplace_vector_op(Op&& op, const std::size_t n, Result* const result,
385  const Args* const... args) {
386 #ifdef HAVE_INTEL_TBB
387  // std::cout << "INPLACE_TBB_VECTOR_OP" << std::endl;
388  SizeTRange range(0, n);
389 
390  // if support lambda variadic
391  // auto apply_inplace_vector_op = [op, result, args...](SizeTRange
392  // &range) {
393  // size_t offset = range.begin();
394  // size_t n_range = range.size();
395  // inplace_vector_op_serial(op, n_range, result + offset, (args +
396  // offset)...);
397  // };
398  // else
399  auto apply_inplace_vector_op =
400  ApplyInplaceVectorOp<Op, Result, Args...>(op, result, args...);
401 
402  tbb::parallel_for(range, apply_inplace_vector_op, tbb::auto_partitioner());
403 #else
404  inplace_vector_op_serial(op, n, result, args...);
405 #endif
406 }
407 
408 template <typename Op, typename Result, typename... Args,
409  typename std::enable_if<!std::is_void<typename std::result_of<
410  Op(Args...)>::type>::value>::type* = nullptr>
411 void vector_op_serial(Op&& op, const std::size_t n, Result* const result,
412  const Args* const... args) {
413  auto wrapper_op = [&op](Result& res, param_type<Args>... a) {
414  res = op(a...);
415  };
416 
417  std::size_t i = 0ul;
418 
419  // Compute block iteration limit
420  constexpr std::size_t index_mask = ~std::size_t(TILEDARRAY_LOOP_UNWIND - 1ul);
421  const std::size_t nx = n & index_mask;
422 
423  for (; i < nx; i += TILEDARRAY_LOOP_UNWIND) {
424  Block<Result> result_block;
425  for_each_block(wrapper_op, result_block, Block<Args>(args + i)...);
426  result_block.store(result + i);
427  }
428 
429  for_each_block_n(wrapper_op, n - i, result + i, (args + i)...);
430 }
431 
432 #ifdef HAVE_INTEL_TBB
433 
434 template <typename Op, typename Result, typename... Args>
435 class ApplyVectorOp {
436  public:
437  ApplyVectorOp(Op& op, Result* const result, const Args* const... args)
438  : op_(op), result_(result), args_(args...) {}
439 
440  ~ApplyVectorOp() {}
441 
442  template <std::size_t... Is>
443  void helper(SizeTRange& range, const std::index_sequence<Is...>&) const {
444  std::size_t offset = range.begin();
445  std::size_t n_range = range.size();
446  vector_op_serial(op_, n_range, result_ + offset,
447  (std::get<Is>(args_) + offset)...);
448  }
449 
450  void operator()(SizeTRange& range) const {
451  helper(range, std::make_index_sequence<sizeof...(Args)>());
452  }
453 
454  private:
455  Op& op_;
456  Result* const result_;
457  std::tuple<const Args* const...> args_;
458 };
459 
460 #endif
461 
462 template <typename Op, typename Result, typename... Args,
463  typename std::enable_if<!std::is_void<typename std::result_of<
464  Op(Args...)>::type>::value>::type* = nullptr>
465 void vector_op(Op&& op, const std::size_t n, Result* const result,
466  const Args* const... args) {
467 #ifdef HAVE_INTEL_TBB
468  // std::cout << "TBB_VECTOR_OP" << std::endl;
469  SizeTRange range(0, n);
470 
471  // if support lambda variadic
472  // auto apply_vector_op = [op, result, args...](SizeTRange &range) {
473  // size_t offset = range.begin();
474  // size_t n_range = range.size();
475  // vector_op_serial(op, n_range, result + offset, (args +
476  // offset)...);
477  // };
478  // else
479  auto apply_vector_op =
480  ApplyVectorOp<Op, Result, Args...>(op, result, args...);
481 
482  tbb::parallel_for(range, apply_vector_op, tbb::auto_partitioner());
483 #else
484  vector_op_serial(op, n, result, args...);
485 #endif
486 }
487 
488 template <typename Op, typename Result, typename... Args>
489 void vector_ptr_op_serial(Op&& op, const std::size_t n, Result* const result,
490  const Args* const... args) {
491  std::size_t i = 0ul;
492 
493  // Compute block iteration limit
494  constexpr std::size_t index_mask = ~std::size_t(TILEDARRAY_LOOP_UNWIND - 1ul);
495  const std::size_t nx = n & index_mask;
496 
497  for (; i < nx; i += TILEDARRAY_LOOP_UNWIND)
498  for_each_block_ptr(op, result + i, Block<Args>(args + i)...);
499  for_each_block_ptr_n(op, n - i, result + i, (args + i)...);
500 }
501 
502 #ifdef HAVE_INTEL_TBB
503 template <typename Op, typename Result, typename... Args>
504 class ApplyVectorPtrOp {
505  public:
506  ApplyVectorPtrOp(Op& op, Result* const result, const Args* const... args)
507  : op_(op), result_(result), args_(args...) {}
508 
509  ~ApplyVectorPtrOp() {}
510 
511  template <std::size_t... Is>
512  void helper(SizeTRange& range, const std::index_sequence<Is...>&) const {
513  std::size_t offset = range.begin();
514  std::size_t n_range = range.size();
515  vector_ptr_op_serial(op_, n_range, result_ + offset,
516  (std::get<Is>(args_) + offset)...);
517  }
518 
519  void operator()(SizeTRange& range) const {
520  helper(range, std::make_index_sequence<sizeof...(Args)>());
521  }
522 
523  private:
524  Op& op_;
525  Result* const result_;
526  std::tuple<const Args* const...> args_;
527 };
528 #endif

530 template <typename Op, typename Result, typename... Args>
531 void vector_ptr_op(Op&& op, const std::size_t n, Result* const result,
532  const Args* const... args) {
533 #ifdef HAVE_INTEL_TBB
534  // std::cout << "TBB_VECTOR_PTR_OP" << std::endl;
535  SizeTRange range(0, n);
536 
537  // if support lambda variadic
538  // auto apply_vector_ptr_op = [op, result, args...](SizeTRange &range)
539  // {
540  // size_t offset = range.begin();
541  // size_t n_range = range.size();
542  // vector_ptr_op_serial(op, n_range, result + offset, (args +
543  // offset)...);
544  // };
545  // else
546  auto apply_vector_ptr_op =
547  ApplyVectorPtrOp<Op, Result, Args...>(op, result, args...);
548  tbb::parallel_for(range, apply_vector_ptr_op, tbb::auto_partitioner());
549 #else
550  vector_ptr_op_serial(op, n, result, args...);
551 #endif
552 }
553 
554 template <typename Op, typename Result, typename... Args>
555 void reduce_op_serial(Op&& op, const std::size_t n, Result& result,
556  const Args* const... args) {
557  std::size_t i = 0ul;
558 
559  // Compute block iteration limit
560  constexpr std::size_t index_mask = ~std::size_t(TILEDARRAY_LOOP_UNWIND - 1ul);
561  const std::size_t nx = n & index_mask;
562 
563  for (; i < nx; i += TILEDARRAY_LOOP_UNWIND) {
564  Result temp = result;
565  reduce_block(op, temp, Block<Args>(args + i)...);
566  result = temp;
567  }
568 
569  reduce_block_n(op, n - i, result, (args + i)...);
570 }
571 
572 #ifdef HAVE_INTEL_TBB
573 template <typename ReduceOp, typename JoinOp, typename Result, typename... Args>
576 class ApplyReduceOp {
577  public:
578  ApplyReduceOp(ReduceOp& reduce_op, JoinOp& join_op, const Result& identity,
579  const Result& result, const Args* const... args)
580  : reduce_op_(reduce_op),
581  join_op_(join_op),
582  identity_(identity),
583  result_(result),
584  args_(args...) {}
585 
586  ApplyReduceOp(ApplyReduceOp& rhs, tbb::split)
587  : reduce_op_(rhs.reduce_op_),
588  join_op_(rhs.join_op_),
589  identity_(rhs.identity_),
590  result_(rhs.identity_),
591  args_(rhs.args_) {}
592 
593  ~ApplyReduceOp() {}
594 
595  template <std::size_t... Is>
596  void helper(SizeTRange& range, const std::index_sequence<Is...>&) {
597  std::size_t offset = range.begin();
598  std::size_t n_range = range.size();
599  reduce_op_serial(reduce_op_, n_range, result_,
600  (std::get<Is>(args_) + offset)...);
601  }
602 
603  void operator()(SizeTRange& range) {
604  helper(range, std::make_index_sequence<sizeof...(Args)>());
605  }
606 
607  void join(const ApplyReduceOp& rhs) { join_op_(result_, rhs.result_); }
608 
609  const Result result() const { return result_; }
610 
611  private:
612  ReduceOp& reduce_op_;
613  JoinOp& join_op_;
614  const Result identity_;
615  Result result_;
616  std::tuple<const Args* const...> args_;
617 };
618 #endif
619 
620 template <typename ReduceOp, typename JoinOp, typename Result, typename... Args>
621 void reduce_op(ReduceOp&& reduce_op, JoinOp&& join_op, const Result& identity,
622  const std::size_t n, Result& result, const Args* const... args) {
623  // TODO implement reduce operation with TBB
624 #ifdef HAVE_INTEL_TBB
625  SizeTRange range(0, n);
626 
627  auto apply_reduce_op = ApplyReduceOp<ReduceOp, JoinOp, Result, Args...>(
628  reduce_op, join_op, identity, result, args...);
629 
630  tbb::parallel_reduce(range, apply_reduce_op, tbb::auto_partitioner());
631 
632  result = apply_reduce_op.result();
633 #else
634  reduce_op_serial(reduce_op, n, result, args...);
635 #endif
636 }
637 
638 template <typename Arg, typename Result>
639 typename std::enable_if<!(std::is_same<Arg, Result>::value &&
640  detail::is_scalar_v<Arg>)>::type
641 copy_vector(const std::size_t n, const Arg* const arg, Result* const result) {
642  std::size_t i = 0ul;
643 
644  // Compute block iteration limit
645  constexpr std::size_t index_mask = ~std::size_t(TILEDARRAY_LOOP_UNWIND - 1ul);
646  const std::size_t nx = n & index_mask;
647 
648  for (; i < nx; i += TILEDARRAY_LOOP_UNWIND) copy_block(result + i, arg + i);
649  copy_block_n(n - i, result + i, arg + i);
650 }
651 
652 template <typename T>
653 inline typename std::enable_if<detail::is_scalar_v<T>>::type copy_vector(
654  const std::size_t n, const T* const arg, T* const result) {
655  std::memcpy(result, arg, n * sizeof(T));
656 }
657 
658 template <typename Arg, typename Result>
659 void fill_vector(const std::size_t n, const Arg& arg, Result* const result) {
660  auto fill_op = [arg](Result& res) { res = arg; };
661  vector_op(fill_op, n, result);
662 }
663 
664 template <typename Arg, typename Result>
665 typename std::enable_if<!(detail::is_scalar_v<Arg> &&
666  detail::is_scalar_v<Result>)>::type
667 uninitialized_copy_vector(const std::size_t n, const Arg* const arg,
668  Result* const result) {
669  auto op = [](Result* const res, param_type<Arg> a) { new (res) Result(a); };
670  vector_ptr_op(op, n, result, arg);
671 }
672 
673 template <typename Arg, typename Result>
674 inline typename std::enable_if<detail::is_scalar_v<Arg> &&
675  detail::is_scalar_v<Result>>::type
676 uninitialized_copy_vector(const std::size_t n, const Arg* const arg,
677  Result* const result) {
678  copy_vector(n, arg, result);
679 }
680 
681 template <typename Arg, typename Result>
682 typename std::enable_if<!(detail::is_scalar_v<Arg> &&
683  detail::is_scalar_v<Result>)>::type
684 uninitialized_fill_vector(const std::size_t n, const Arg& arg,
685  Result* const result) {
686  auto op = [arg](Result* const res) { new (res) Result(arg); };
687  vector_ptr_op(op, n, result);
688 }
689 
690 template <typename Arg, typename Result>
691 inline typename std::enable_if<detail::is_scalar_v<Arg> &&
692  detail::is_scalar_v<Result>>::type
693 uninitialized_fill_vector(const std::size_t n, const Arg& arg,
694  Result* const result) {
695  fill_vector(n, arg, result);
696 }
697 
698 template <typename Arg>
699 typename std::enable_if<!detail::is_scalar_v<Arg>>::type destroy_vector(
700  const std::size_t n, Arg* const arg) {
701  auto op = [](Arg* const a) { a->~Arg(); };
702  vector_ptr_op(op, n, arg);
703 }
704 
705 template <typename Arg>
706 inline typename std::enable_if<detail::is_scalar_v<Arg>>::type destroy_vector(
707  const std::size_t, const Arg* const) {}
708 
709 template <typename Arg, typename Result, typename Op>
710 typename std::enable_if<!(detail::is_scalar_v<Arg> &&
711  detail::is_scalar_v<Result>)>::type
712 uninitialized_unary_vector_op(const std::size_t n, const Arg* const arg,
713  Result* const result, Op&& op) {
714  auto wrapper_op = [&op](Result* const res, param_type<Arg> a) {
715  new (res) Result(op(a));
716  };
717  vector_ptr_op(wrapper_op, n, result, arg);
718 }
719 
720 template <typename Arg, typename Result, typename Op>
721 inline typename std::enable_if<detail::is_scalar_v<Arg> &&
722  detail::is_scalar_v<Result>>::type
723 uninitialized_unary_vector_op(const std::size_t n, const Arg* const arg,
724  Result* const result, Op&& op) {
725  vector_op(op, n, result, arg);
726 }
727 
728 template <typename Left, typename Right, typename Result, typename Op>
729 typename std::enable_if<!(detail::is_scalar_v<Left> &&
730  detail::is_scalar_v<Right> &&
731  detail::is_scalar_v<Result>)>::type
732 uninitialized_binary_vector_op(const std::size_t n, const Left* const left,
733  const Right* const right, Result* const result,
734  Op&& op) {
735  auto wrapper_op = [&op](Result* const res, param_type<Left> l,
736  param_type<Right> r) { new (res) Result(op(l, r)); };
737 
738  vector_ptr_op(op, n, result, left, right);
739 }
740 
741 template <typename Left, typename Right, typename Result, typename Op>
742 typename std::enable_if<detail::is_scalar_v<Left> &&
743  detail::is_scalar_v<Right> &&
744  detail::is_scalar_v<Result>>::type
745 uninitialized_binary_vector_op(const std::size_t n, const Left* const left,
746  const Right* const right, Result* const result,
747  Op&& op) {
748  vector_op(op, n, result, left, right);
749 }
